content: निर्वृत्ति {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} Accomplishment, fulfilment; <ls>Ms. 12. 1.</ls> {@--2@} Completion, end. {@--3@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) Discontinuance of the influence of one rule over another (<ab>opp.</ab> अनुवृत्ति). {@--4@} Result fruit. {@--5@} Ceasing, desisting, abstaining from. {@--6@} Inactivity. {@--7@} Impropriety. {@--8@} Final beatitude.
